@blank-1 I rechecked the document, the description is included already in the YAML file format definition.

https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/setup/backend/backend-fetcher.md#metric_rules
```
# The name of rule, which combinates with a prefix 'meter_' as the index/table name in storage.
name: <string>
```
